review: I really enjoy this streaming device.  It's easy to setup and I can sideload many of my favorite apps.
author: soyalozo

review: It arrived fast and was in good working condition - just as new. My disappointment with the product is that there aren't good enough apps and software for amazon Fire TV. For example, there is no web browser supported, no skype, facebook or other social media.The apps that are available do not seem to be well-built and do not seem to have basics.
author: Valderama

review: Does not stream very good.  Had to have a cable tech come out three times just to find out its the Fire TV.  Remote is so small I can't find it .
author: Jesse D.

review: I am very pleased with the Amazon Fire TV.  In addition to all the movies and TV shows available on the Fire - and a lot of them for free - I have access to my music and digital photos stored on the Cloud - all a big plus.  My husband and I are enjoying watching the old TV sitcoms from the '60's and early '70's which are far superior to the sitcoms shown today.  I love it.
author: Connie J. Tritt
